paper_abstract: The magnetic correlation in the Hubbard model on a honeycomb lattice is systematically studied by quantum Monte Carlo method It is found that the magnetic order is qualitatively different in two filling regions separated by the Van Hove singularity around < n > = 0 75 A short-ranged ferromagnetic correlation is found in the low filling region which is enhanced slightly by the on-site Coulomb interaction The ferromagnetic fluctuation depends sensitively on the filling but is strengthened markedly as the next-nearest hoping integral increases (C) 2010 Elsevier BV All rights reserved
paper_title: Magnetic correlation in the Hubbard model on a honeycomb lattice
